    • Uses of FeatureCodec in htsjdk.tribble

      Classes in htsjdk.tribble that implement FeatureCodec 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractFeatureCodec<FEATURE_TYPE extends Feature,SOURCE>
      Simple basic class providing much of the basic functionality of codecs Every concrete subclass must implement canDecode(String) to indicate whether it can decode the file.
      class  AsciiFeatureCodec<T extends Feature>
      A convenience base class for codecs that want to read in features from ASCII lines.
      class  BinaryFeatureCodec<T extends Feature>
      Implements common methods of FeatureCodecs that read from PositionalBufferedStreams.
